resources.string: Use \'Copy\' button then use \'Register\' to view the Google device registration page at\n\'https://www.google.com/android/uncertified\'\nThere paste the Google Services Framework ID in the text box at the bottom.
There is no browser app installed to open the Google device registration page at \n\'https://www.google.com/android/uncertified\'\nPlease install a browser from OmniStore or any other provider.
